|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Intel (Lantiq);WAV654;WAV654A0MC, S9074L10, SLMRS; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = 2402 |rad2ax = 1201 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== * Web GUI: http://www.routerlogin.net
The CPU is listed as a "powerful dual-core processor". :This might suggest that this device is using :[[Intel (Lantiq)]] chips like the [[ASUS RT-AX58U]].
<!-- {{FCC ST|09/11/2019|indexme.}} -->
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] ''AnyWAN'' PXB4395EL1600 (SLMD9) :Dual Core @800MHz ([https://ark.intel.com/products/92553/Intel-AnyWAN-GRX350-Network-Processors GRX350] • MIPS [http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lantiq-announces-carrier-class-network-processing-for-home-gateway-300050735.html interAptiv]) {{SCollapse| Intel AnyWAN GRX350/GRX550 Series Network Processors • >> |• Model • Ordering Code • Spec Code • Stepping • Freq. (MHz) • ;[https://ark.intel.com/content/www/us/en/ark/products/92553/intel-anywan-soc-grx350-series.html Intel AnyWAN SoC GRX350 Series] *GRX350 • GRX350A3BC120 (SLMQ2) - A3 (1200MHz) *GRX350 • GRX350A3BC160 (SLMQ3) - A3 (1600MHz) *PXB4395 • PXB4395EL1200 (SLMD8) - A2 (1200MHz) *PXB4395 • PXB4395EL1600 (SLMD9) - A2 (1600MHz) :• :PXB4395EL (SLLF8) • PXB4395EL1600 (SLLFB) ;[https://ark.intel.com/content/www/us/en/ark/products/93818/intel-anywan-soc-grx550-series.html Intel AnyWAN SoC GRX550 Series] *GRX550 • GRX550A3BC200 (SLMQ4) - A3 (2000MHz) *PXB4583 • PXB4583EL2000 (SLLZR) - A2 (2000MHz) :• PXB4583EL2000 (SLLK4) • PXB4583EL2400 (SLLST) ;[https://ark.intel.com/content/www/us/en/ark/products/99476/intel-anywan-soc-grx750-series.html Intel AnyWAN SoC GRX750 Series] *GRX750 • GRX750-4000 (SR3xx) - 1MB (2GHz) :FHCE2732 (SR3AM), FHCE2733 (SR35Y), FHCE2734 (SR31C) :GRX750-4000 (16k), GRX750-4400 (20k) • EASY750 :''Products formerly Cougar Mountain'' }}<!-- ;Intel AnyWAN Network Processors *PXB4202EL (SLLET) - GRX220 *PXB4210ELV12 (SLLEV) - GRX288 *PXB4310EL (SLLEW) - GRX300 *PXB4310ELV12 (SLLxx) - GRX388 (EL V1.2) *PXB4320ELV12 (SLMDA) - IRX200 (EL V1.2) :PXB4320ELV12 (SLLYC) - IRX200 (EL V1.2) ? *PXB4320ELV13 (SLMLE) - IRX200 (EL V1.3) *PXB4369ELV21 (SLLEX) - GRX300 (EL V2.1) *PXB4379EL (SLLEY) - GRX300 *PXB4387ELV21 (SLLF2) - GRX387 (EL V2.1) *PXB4387ELV21D (SLLF3) - GRX387 (EL V2.1D) *PXB4389EL (SLLF4) - GRX300 *PXB4389ELV217 (SLLF6) - GRX330 (EL V2.17) *PXB4395EL1200 (SLMD8) :PXB4395EL (SLLF8) ? *PXB4395EL1600 (SLMD9) :PXB4395EL1600 (SLLFB) *PXB4583EL1600 (SLLFB) ?? *PXB4583EL2000 (SLLZR) :PXB4583EL2000 (SLLK4) ? *PXB4583EL2400 (SLLST) ? Note: most of the chip information is wrong, we should correct it, get the REAL chip information, :support GRX350 v1.1/v1.2, GRX550: http://k3c.paldier.com/tools/readchip ; source code: :https://github.com/paldier/K3C/tree/master/ugw/feeds_opensrc/debug_tools/readchip 0x0020 : "G583 Pxb4583el-1600" 0x0021 : "G582 Pxb4582el-1600" 0x0022 : "G562 Pxb4562el-1600" 0x0023 : "G582 Pxb4582el-2000" 0x0024 : "G583 Pxb4583el-2000" 0x0025 : "G583 Pxb4583el-2400" 0x0026 : "G350-6 Pxb4395el-1200" 0x0028 : "G350-8 Pxb4395el-1600" --> *WLAN: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] [https://ark.intel.com/content/www/us/en/ark/products/135926/intel-home-wi-fi-chipset-wav600-series.html WAV654A0MC] (SLMRS) :Wi-Fi 6, 2x 2T2R 802.11abgn/ac/ax (AX3000)
